sections.title: ğŸ“Œ Data Collection
content: We collect the following personal information as required to provide our services.
Collected items:
- [Required] Email address, name, profile image
- [Required] External service authentication tokens (e.g., Notion, GitHub, Vercel)
- [Automatically collected] Session tokens, user activity logs
- [Automatically collected] IP address, browser information, access time

sections.title: ğŸ” Purpose of Use
content: Personal information is used for the following purposes and legal bases:
- [Contract fulfillment] Login and user authentication
- [Contract fulfillment] Deployment, repository creation, and content management through external services
- [Legitimate interests] Error tracking and customer support
- [Legitimate interests] Statistical analysis and service improvement
- [Legal obligations] Compliance with applicable laws and regulations

sections.title: ğŸ”’ Retention & Protection
content: Personal information is retained according to the minimum retention period required by applicable laws and is promptly destroyed upon deletion request or account termination.
Personal information may be transferred overseas through external services such as Vercel (USA) and GitHub (USA).
Third-party provision: Personal information will not be provided to third parties without user consent unless required by law.
Trusted service providers: AWS, Vercel, GitHub, Notion, etc.
We implement the following security measures:
- Secure encryption and storage of personal information
- Encryption protection of all sensitive information, including external service authentication tokens
- Minimization of access rights and enhanced authentication management
- Regular security checks and audits

sections.title: ğŸ‘¤ User Rights
content: Users have the right to:
- Request access, correction, or deletion
- Request processing suspension
Requests will be processed within 30 days.

sections.title: ğŸª Cookies & Tracking
content: Cookies are used minimally for session maintenance.
Users can control cookie settings through their browser preferences.
Cookies are minimally used for session maintenance.

sections.title: ğŸ“œ Contact & Responsibility
content: For inquiries, please contact:
ğŸ“§ contact@logme.dev

sections.title: ğŸ‘¶ Children's Privacy
content: Children under the age of 14 cannot use the service without parental consent.
